rules.name: myRule_7
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 OR 2 OR 3) AND ((4 OR 5 OR 6) AND (11 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10)))
rules.label: Is DSO NOO Opportunity?

rules.name: myRule_9
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 OR 2 OR 3) AND (9 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8))
rules.label: Is DSO RNC Opportunity?

Flow.description: Residential HVAC process for automatic updates and notifications on new opportunities.
Flow.label: RHVAC New Opportunity Process
